hero.title: Vaulte Mission
hero.description: We want everyone to have full control over their finances. We believe that Open Banking is the future that belongs to the user, not the institutions.

history.title: Our History
history.p1: The Vaulte project was born in 2024 when we noticed how difficult it is to manage a budget while having accounts in three different banks. Logging into each of them, writing down expenses in Excel... it was a waste of time.
history.p2_end: directive to create one secure place that aggregates this data. Today, we are proud to help thousands of people save smarter.
